name: uCraft Lite
description:
uCraft Lite

uCraft Lite is a 2D block building game where you can build anything you want. Save multiple worlds. Explore, Build, Dig, and just have fun.

Make sure you check back regularly for updates.

Features

- Frequent Updates.

- Dynamic weather

- Multi-Layer tile engine.

- Spawn Blocks, Build Stuff, Your only limits are your device and mind.

- Explode mobs with TNT.

- Create chain reactions with TNT and torches.

- Make trees from saplings.

- Set burnable objects on fire and watch it spread.
